metadata.name: Arbitrary Binary Execution Using GUP Utility
metadata.comment: Detects execution of the Notepad++ updater (gup) to launch other commands or executables

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\gup.exe')) AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\explorer.exe')) AND NOT (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\explorer.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\notepad++\\notepad++.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\notepad++\\updater\\')) OR process.cmd_line is null))

output.summary: Detects execution of the Notepad++ updater (gup) to launch other commands or executables

metadata.objective: False positive: Other parent binaries using GUP not currently identified Reference: https://twitter.com/nas_bench/status/1535322445439180803
